name: KGH Customs Services
goal: KGH is one of the major providers of customs brokerage services in Europe. Every year, we handle thousands of different products from all around the globe. Our offer also includes consultancy, educational, company establishment and software services.
interests: Budget, Customs, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: The implementation of the Union Customs Code, the development within EU's Single VAT Area, EU's Customs Data Model, Centralised Clearance and other relevant topics concerning cross-border trade.
